name: Brainiac (V)
Lore: 'BoShek nicknamed this male Siniteen ''Brainiac'' due to his ability to calculate hyperspace coordinates in his head. ''He''s the brains, sweetheart!''',
Text: 'X = Light Side cards in hand. Y = Dark Side cards in hand. If X < Y, your Force generation is +1. If X = Y, adds one battle destiny. Once per turn, if X > Y, may lose a card from hand to make a just drawn weapon or battle destiny = pi.',
